+ "* mark: Mark a task as done Eg: mark 3\n"
+ "* unmark: Mark a task as not done Eg: unmark 3\n"
+ "* delete: Delete a task Eg: delete 4\n"
+ "* find: Find a task by searching for a substring Eg: find Lecture\n"
